GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an Azure Large Instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Patches the Tags field of an Azure Large Instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of Azure Large Instances in the specified subscription and resource group. The operations returns various properties of each Azure Large Instance.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetAzureLargeInstances
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets a list of Azure Large Instances in the specified subscription. The operations returns various properties of each Azure Large Instance.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to restart an Azure Large Instance (only for compute instances)

OtherOperations.Name: Shutdown
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to shutdown an Azure Large Instance (only for compute instances)

OtherOperations.Name: Start
OtherOperations.Description: The operation to start an Azure Large Instance (only for compute instances)

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an Azure Large Storage instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Patches the Tags field of a Azure Large Storage Instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of AzureLargeStorageInstances in the specified subscription and resource group. The operations returns various properties of each Azure LargeStorage instance.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetAzureLargeStorageInstances
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets a list of AzureLargeStorageInstances in the specified subscription. The operations returns various properties of each Azure LargeStorage instance.
